column4: Question - someone just asked me, does Ubuntu have a Windows-like "restore" utility? I had never even come across the need for one, but nonetheless, I figured I'd ask since I'm a bit curious now... Any idea?
Yes and no. You can backup settings files and media files, but nothing quite like restore
so nothing for the OS itself besides brewing up an image, no?
ya, but I guess you could do a git of your ENTIRE OS, and that would be the same xD
